title: How Do You Stop Man City’s Erling Haaland? You Don’t.
description: The Manchester City striker is too big, too fast, too strong, too good. Manchester United was the most recent team to find that out. It won’t be the last.
dc:creator: Rory Smith
media:description: Erling Haaland scored a hat trick in a 6-3 victory against Manchester United on Sunday, giving him 17 goals in 10 games this season.
